title: location

link_id.description: Required. Road Link ID. Foreign Key from Road_Link.

ref_node_id.description: Required. The From node of the link. Foreign Key from Node.

lr.description: Required. Linear Reference of the location, measured as distance along the link from the reference node.  If link_geometry exists, it is used. Otherwise, link geometry is assumed to be a crow-fly distance from A node to B node.

x_coord.description: Optional. Either provided, or derived from Link, Ref_Node and LR.

y_coord.description: Optional. Either provided, or derived from Link, Ref_Node and LR.

loc_type.description: Optional. What it represents (driveway, bus stop, etc.) OpenStreetMap map feature names are recommended.

gtfs_stop_id.description: Optional. Foreign Key to GTFS data. For bus stops and transit station entrances, provides a link to the General Transit Feed Specification.

description: A location is a vertex that is associated with a specific location along a link. Locations may be used to represent places where activities occur (e.g., driveways and bus stops). Its attributes are nearly the same as those for a node, except that the location includes an associated link and node, with location specified as distance along the link from the node.
